title: HPA Cargo Domino Cargo Cage
content:
HPA just announced the Cargo Domino ($12), a minimal, lightweight, and modular cargo cage. The HPA Cargo Domino uses standards and commodity hardware to accomplish everything standard cages can do while allowing an adventurer’s imagination to run wild with possibilities. You can buy HPA’s bolts and supports or just use the Cargo Domino to strap a cargo bag directly to your fork.

Roll on over to HPA to check it out and be inspired.
